com.parkingtycoon.views

Class FloorsView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkingtycoon.views.BaseView
      • com.parkingtycoon.views.FloorsView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable

    public final class FloorsView
extends BaseView
    This Class is responsible for rendering all floorTiles, and transition effects between floors
